strings.string:
[$8632] / +50%[$12948] / +75%[$15106] / +100%[$17264]
 
So, you're here. I'm BROCK. I'm PEWTER's GYM LEADER.
My rock-hard willpower is evident even in my POKéMON.
My POKéMON are all rock hard, and have true-grit determination.
That's right - my POKéMON are all the ROCK type! Fuhaha!
You're going to challenge me knowing that you'll lose?
That's the TRAINER's honor that compels you to challenge me.
Fine, then! Show me your best!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8632] / +50%[$12948] / +75%[$15106] / +100%[$17264]
 
There are all kinds of TRAINERS in this huge world of ours.
You appear to be very gifted as a POKéMON TRAINER.
So let me make a suggestion.
Go to the GYM in CERULEAN and test your abilities.

[$8736] / +50%[$13104] / +75%[$15288] / +100%[$17472]
 
Hi, you're a new face! Only those TRAINERS who have a policy
about POKéMON can turn pro. What is your approach when you
catch and train POKéMON? My policy is an all-out offensive
with WATER-type POKéMON!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8736] / +50%[$13104] / +75%[$15288] / +100%[$17472]
 
TM03 teaches WATER PULSE. Use it on an aquatic POKéMON!

[$8840] / +50%[$13260] / +75%[$15470] / +100%[$17680]
 
Hey, kid! What do you think you're doing here? You won't live
long in combat! Not with your puny power! I tell you, kid,
electric POKéMON saved me during the war! They zapped my
enemies into paralysis! The same as I'll do to you!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8840] / +50%[$13260] / +75%[$15470] / +100%[$17680]
 
A little word of advice, kid! Electricity is sure powerful!
But, it's useless against GROUND-type POKéMON!

[$8944] / +50%[$13416] / +75%[$15652] / +100%[$17888]
 
Hello... Lovely weather, isn't it? it's so pleasant......Oh,
dear... I must have dozed off. Welcome. My name is ERIKA. I am
the LEADER of CELADON GYM. I am a student of the art of
flower arranging. My POKéMON are solely of the GRASS type....
Oh, I'm sorry, I had no idea that you wished to challenge me.
Very well, but I shall not lose.
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8944] / +50%[$13416] / +75%[$15652] / +100%[$17888]
 
You are cataloging POKéMON? I must say I'm impressed.
I would never collect POKéMON if they were unattractive.

[$9152] / +50%[$13728] / +75%[$16016] / +100%[$18304]
 
I had a vision of your arrival. I have had psychic powers since
I was a child. It started when a spoon I carelessly tossed, bent.
I dislike battling, but if you wish, I will show you my powers!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9152] / +50%[$13728] / +75%[$16016] / +100%[$18304]
 
TM04 is CALM MIND. It makes the POKéMON concentrate
to raise both SP. ATK and SP. DEF.

[$9048] / +50%[$13572] / +75%[$15834] / +100%[$18096]
 
Fwahahaha! A mere child like you dares to challenge me?
The very idea makes me shiver with mirth! Very well, I shall
show you true terror as a ninja master. Poison brings steady
doom. Sleep renders foes helpless. Despair to the creeping
horror of POISON-type POKéMON!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9048] / +50%[$13572] / +75%[$15834] / +100%[$18096]
 
When afflicted by TOXIC, a POKéMON suffers more and more.
It suffers worsening damage as the battle wears on!
It will surely terrorize foes!

[$9256] / +50%[$13884] / +75%[$16198] / +100%[$18512]
 
Hah! I am BLAINE, the red-hot LEADER of CINNABAR GYM!
My fiery POKéMON are all rough and ready with intense heat!
They incinerate all challengers! Hah! You better have BURN HEAL!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9256] / +50%[$13884] / +75%[$16198] / +100%[$18512]
 
TM38 contains FIRE BLAST. Teach it to FIRE-type POKéMON.
VULPIX or CHARMELEON would be ideal for that move.
From here on, you face the ELITE FOUR one by one.\nIf you win, a door opens to the next TRAINER. Good luck!

Welcome to the POKéMON LEAGUE. I, LORELEI of the ELITE FOUR,
have returned! You know how it goes. No one can best me when
it comes to icy POKéMON. Freezing moves are powerful. Your
POKéMON will be at my mercy when they are frozen solid.
Hahaha! Are you ready?
\n\n
You're better than I thought. Go on ahead.\nYou only got a taste of the POKéMON LEAGUE's power.

I am BRUNO of the ELITE FOUR! Through rigorous training, people
and POKéMON can become stronger without limit. I've lived and
trained with my fighting POKéMON! And that will never change!
{01}! We will grind you down with our
superior power! Hoo hah!
\n\n
My job is done.\nGo face your next challenge.

I am AGATHA of the ELITE FOUR. I hear OAK's taken a lot
of interest in you, child. That old duff was once tough and
handsome. But that was decades ago. He's a shadow of his
former self. Now he just wants to fiddle with his POKéDEX.
He's wrong. POKéMON are for battling! {01}!
I'll show you how a real TRAINER battles!
\n\n
You win! I see what the old duff sees in you now.\nI have nothing else to say. Run along now, child!

Ah! So, you've returned, {01}! I lead
the ELITE FOUR. You can call me LANCE the dragon TRAINER.
You know that dragons are mythical POKéMON. They're hard to
catch and raise, but their powers are superior. They're virtually
indestructible. There's no being clever with them. Well, are you
ready to lose? Your LEAGUE challenge ends with me,
{01}!
\n\n

I still can't believe my dragons lost to you, {01}.
You are now the POKéMON LEAGUE CHAMPION! ...Or, you would
have been, but you have one more challenge left. There is one
more TRAINER to face! His name is...{06}! He beat the ELITE
FOUR before you. He is the real POKéMON LEAGUE CHAMPION.

{06}: Hey, {01}!
You came back, {01}! Hahah, that is so great!
My rival should be strong to keep me sharp. While working on
my POKéDEX, I looked all over for POKéMON. Not only that,
I assembled teams that would beat any POKéMON type.
And now... I'm the POKéMON LEAGUE CHAMPION!
{01}! Do you know what that means?
I'll tell you. I am the most powerful TRAINER in the world!
\n\n
Why? Why did I lose? I never made any mistakes raising my\nPOKéMON... Darn it! You're the new POKéMON LEAGUE\nCHAMPION! Although I don't like to admit it...

OAK: So, you've won! Sincerely, congratulations! You're
the new POKéMON LEAGUE CHAMPION! You've grown up so much
since you first left with {02} to work on the POKéDEX.
{01}, you have come of age!

OAK: {06}... I'm disappointed in you. I came when I heard you'd
beaten the ELITE FOUR. But, when I got here, you had already
lost! {06}, do you understand why you lost? You have forgotten
to treat your POKéMON with love and trust. Without them,
you will never become a CHAMP again!

OAK: {01}.
You understand that your victory was not just your own doing.
The bond you share with your POKéMON is marvelous.
{01}! Come with me!

OAK: Er-hem! Congratulations, {01}!
This floor is the POKéMON HALL OF FAME. POKéMON LEAGUE
CHAMPIONS are honored for their exploits here. Their POKéMON
are also recorded in the HALL OF FAME. {01}!
You have worked hard to become the new LEAGUE CHAMPION.
Congratulations, {01},
you and your POKéMON are HALL OF FAMERS!
I run the DAY-CARE service.\nWould you like me to raise one of your POKéMON?
You're back already? Your {02} needs to\nspend some more time with me.
You owe me ${03} for the return\nof this POKéMON.
Thank you! Here's your POKéMON.
{01} got {02}\nback from the DAY-CARE MAN.
Oh? You only have one POKéMON with you.
I'm the DAY-CARE LADY. We can raise POKéMON for you.\nWould you like us to raise one?
Fine, we'll raise your {02} for a while.\nCome back for it later.
Fine, I'll look after your {02} for a while.
We can raise two of your POKéMON.\nWould you like us to raise one more POKéMON for you?
Come see me in a while.
Ah, it's you! Good to see you.\nYour POKéMON can only be doing good!
By level, your {02} has grown by {03}.
Your POKéMON party is full.\nMake room, then come see me.
If you want your {02} back, it will cost ${03}.
Perfect! Here's your POKéMON.
{01} took back {02} from\nthe DAY-CARE LADY.
Will you take your POKéMON back?
Will you take back the other one, too?
If you leave me that POKéMON, what will you battle with?
Fine. Come anytime you like.
Hi! Is it your first time here at the SAFARI ZONE?

The SAFARI ZONE actually has four zones in it. Each zone has
different kinds of POKéMON, even some rare ones. Use the
supplied SAFARI BALLS to catch them. You can also throw
BAIT or ROCKS besides the SAFARI BALLS. If you throw BAIT,
the POKéMON becomes less likely to flee, but harder to catch.
If you throw ROCKS, the POKéMON becomes more likely to flee,
but easier to catch. When you run out of time or SAFARI BALLS,
it's game over for you!
Welcome to the SAFARI ZONE!
For just $500, you can play the SAFARI GAME.\nYou can roam the wide-open safari and catch what you like.\nWould you like to play?
That'll be $500, please!\nWe only use a special kind of POKé BALLS here.
{01} received 30 SAFARI BALLS\nfrom the attendant.
We'll call you on the PA when you run out of time\nor SAFARI BALLS. Well, I'll wish you the best of luck!
Okay. Please come again!
PA: Ding-dong! Time's up!\nPA: Your SAFARI GAME is over!
PA: Ding-dong!\nYou are out of SAFARI BALLS!\nPA: Your SAFARI GAME is over!
Hello! Welcome to CELADON DEPT. STORE.\nThe board on the right describes the store layout.

1F: SERVICE COUNTER
2F: TRAINER'S MARKET
3F: TV GAME SHOP
4F: WISE MAN GIFTS
5F: DRUGSTORE
ROOFTOP SQUARE: VENDING MACHINES
Hey! A switch behind the poster!?\nLet's push it!
Welcome!\nYou can exchange your COINS for fabulous prizes next door.
Welcome to ROCKET GAME CORNER!\nDo you need some game COINS?\nWould you like to buy some?
No? Please come play sometime!

[$960] / +50%[$1440] / +75%[$1680] / +100%[$1920]
 
I haven't made any progress...
I still can't get the right angle...

[ON COOLDOWN / 6 Hours]
[$960] / +50%[$1440] / +75%[$1680] / +100%[$1920]
 
The sky and the sea... They are so fickle.
Their changing expressions make them difficult to capture.

[$4012] / +50%[$6018] / +75%[$7021] / +100%[$8024]
 
Oh, you will give me another
opportunity to match wits with you?

[ON COOLDOWN / 6 Hours]
[$4012] / +50%[$6018] / +75%[$7021] / +100%[$8024]
 
I find it pleasurable to leisurely battle in the gentle sea breeze.

[$960] / +50%[$1440] / +75%[$1680] / +100%[$1920]
 
Must I repeat myself?
I'm trying to paint.
Please keep out of my sight!

[ON COOLDOWN / 6 Hours]
[$960] / +50%[$1440] / +75%[$1680] / +100%[$1920]
 
GILLIAN?
Please tilt your head slightly... There! That's the look I want!

[$4080] / +50%[$6120] / +75%[$7140] / +100%[$8160]
 
They're almost finished making the pool for my POKéMON.
You must drop in for a visit.

[ON COOLDOWN / 6 Hours]
[$4080] / +50%[$6120] / +75%[$1680] / +100%[$1920]
 
A pool would be nice, but I must say, a sun-room may be sublime.

[$960] / +50%[$1440] / +75%[$1680] / +100%[$1920]
 
With these hands, I will create
my victory today.

[ON COOLDOWN / 6 Hours]
[$960] / +50%[$1440] / +75%[$1680] / +100%[$1920]
 
Uh-oh, my paint tubes have scattered everywhere!

[$928] / +50%[$1392] / +75%[$1624] / +100%[$1856]
 
I'm a good runner.
I've gotten even faster!

[ON COOLDOWN / 6 Hours]
[$928] / +50%[$1392] / +75%[$1624] / +100%[$1856]
 
When I run with the wind, it feels like I could fly!
Need HM-Cut!
Need HM-Strength!

This is CERULEAN CAVE.
Horribly strong POKéMON live inside there.
It takes a very special TRAINER to be allowed inside there.
You'd have to be strong enough to become the
POKéMON LEAGUE CHAMPION for starters.
And, you would have to have made a great achievement.
 
[Beat the Elite 4 in Kanto]
 
[Collect the Ruby and Sapphire for Bill in the
Sevi Islands Questline]
Oh, hey, {01}! Did you see?\nWe got the PC working! I've got a few things to show CELIO here.\nCan you go out on a stroll or something for a while more?

This is my own ferry PASS. It will let you get to all the
SEVII ISLANDS. {01}, please, I can't do it without
your help.
 
[Head to Island 4, inside Icefall Cave, and continue up the
waterfall immediately inside]
{01} handed the SAPPHIRE to CELIO.

CELIO: So this is the gem that forms a pair with the RUBY...
{01}, you've gone through a lot to get this, didn't you?
You don't have to tell me. I know it wasn't easy.
Thank you so much! Now it's my turn to work for you!
Please give me a little time.
Okay, this is good...
I did it! I linked up with LANETTE!

{01}... {01}, I did it!
I've managed to link up with TRAINERS in the HOENN region!
Finally, the Network Machine is fully operational!
{01}, I owe it all to you!
Thanks to you, my dream came true...
I... I'm not crying. That's enough about me!\n{01}, you're going to keep looking for\nexotic POKéMON, right? I wish you the best of luck!
Now, where's LOSTELLE gotten to today?\nShe always brings me lunch every day right about now...

Hm? You, there! Are you a friend of LOSTELLE's?
Have you seen LOSTELLE around?
I don't know where she might be.
She should've been here long ago.
LOSTELLE's a cutie - she got my looks - so what if someone...
What if something's happened to my LOSTELLE?!
Please, help me find her! Please go search THREE ISLAND!

Hah? What is this GAME CORNER? How much sadder can this get?
Those clowns... They said they'd be waiting on the
island, so where are they? Hey, you!
Is this the only THREE ISLAND around here?
Try waking up before you crawl out of bed, you punk.\nThis is TWO ISLAND! Move it! Get your filthy motorbike out of\nmy place!
Huh... Oh, oh, gotcha.\nTch... These islands are confusing...
Would you look at that?\nThat punk scuffed up my floor.

Hey, but listen! I'm begging you, you have to go to THREE ISLAND.
If anything were to happen to my LOSTELLE...
My place is the house with the red roof on THREE ISLAND.
She may just show up late here, so I can't run off anywhere.
That's why I have to get you to do me this big favor.
I'm sorry. We're not running any games today.

We don't need you people bringing your noise and trouble here!
We're asking you to go back to KANTO!
 
[Go to Island 2 Game Corner, the furthest right building]

Hey, go cry somewhere else. Our boss is on his way.
When he gets here, we'll give you a k-rad motorbike show you
won't soon forget!
 
[Go to Island 2 Game Corner, the furthest right building]
W-what!? Not on your life! Get off the island now!\n \n[Go to Island 2 Game Corner, the furthest right building]
Who's gonna make me?\n \n[Go to Island 2 Game Corner, the furthest right building]
Hyahoo! From this day on, this island belongs to us!\n \n[Go to Island 2 Game Corner, the furthest right building]

We're the KANTO RIDER FEDERATION! Vroom! Vavavavooom!
Vroom! My bike's wimpy, so I have to make exhaust noises
myself!
 
[Go to Island 2 Game Corner, the furthest right building]

Hey, hey, lady!
Fork over some spending money!
 
[Go to Island 2 Game Corner, the furthest right building]
Aiyeeh! Wh-who are you?! I... I'll call the police!\n \n[Go to Island 2 Game Corner, the furthest right building]
Are you the boss?\nGo back to KANTO right now!
Hah? I just got here, pal. What's with the hostile attitude?\nIt's mighty cold of you!
Your gang of followers have been raising havoc on their bikes.\nDo you have any idea how much trouble they've caused us on\nthe island?

No, man, I don't get it at all.
Look at this place. What do you do for entertainment?
You ought to be thanking us for livening up this sleepy village.
But hey, if you insist, you can try making us leave.
Grr... You cowards...\nSo tough in a pack...

You, what are you staring at? Don't you know it's not polite?
You wanna make something of it or what?
 
[Make sure you're ready, its 4 battles back to back]
That's smart. Keep your nose out of this.
Heh, I like your guts.\nYou'll be losing money to me, but...
\n\n
Aww, man... Don't you dare laugh!
Aren't you from KANTO? You should be on our side!
\n\n
What's the matter with you, getting all hot like that?\nTotally uncool, man!
We invited the boss out here, but you had to mess it up!\nYou embarrassed us, man!
\n\n
Boss, I'm telling you, you've gotta\ndo something about this kid!
I've been watching you, and I'd say you've done enough.\nWhat are you, their friend or something?\nThen I guess you'll be battling me in their place.
\n\n
Humph! Yeah, go right on hanging\naround with these hayseeds!
Thank you! Those goons were nothing but bad trouble.\nOh, look, your POKéMON got hurt on my account.
{01} was given a FULL RESTORE.
You've got seriously impressive POKéMON with you.

It'd be fantastic if someone as strong as you lived here.
I hope you'll at least stay here a while.
...I beg your pardon? You're looking for LOSTELLE?
LOSTELLE went off towards BOND BRIDGE a while ago.

{06}: Hey! {01}!
What are you doing here in the SEVII ISLANDS?
You should quit copying me, you know?
Anyways, I already got my POKéMON EGG, so I'm done with this island.
Heh, I bet you don't even know about POKéMON EGGS.
You'll never fill your NATIONAL POKéDEX that way.
By the way, I saw someone we both know on this island.
Why don't you go look around if it makes you curious?
Me, I don't have the time to waste.
Be smelling ya!
LORELEI: Keep your filthy hands off the POKéMON in the cave!\nDo as I say, or you'll have me to answer to!
Aww, shut it, lady, and leave us be.\nDon't let your glasses get all steamed up!

LORELEI: {01}?! What are you doing here?
No, we can catch up later. Right now, I need your help.
Help me kick these poachers out before they do anything else.
They've been catching POKéMON here, then selling them off!
Are you ready? You take that one, please!
W-what?! Who says we can't do what we want with the\nPOKéMON we catch?
\n\n
LORELEI: Humph. So despicably weak. You! Tell me!\nWhere have you taken the captured POKéMON?\nI'm smashing your ring once and for all!
N-no way! I'm not telling you that!
LORELEI: If you won't confess, we'll deep-freeze you.\nMy LAPRAS is furious for what you've done to its friends.\nGo, LAPRAS! ICE BEAM...

Wawaah! Okay! I'll talk!
The POKéMON are in the ROCKET WAREHOUSE on FIVE ISLAND.
There! I said it! We'll be going now!
...But I doubt you'll ever make it into the ROCKET WAREHOUSE!
Heheheheh!

{01}, thank you. But this is awful...
I was born and raised here on these islands.
I had no idea that those horrible criminals were loose here...
 
[For the second password, go to
Island 6 -> Ruin Valley -> Dotted Hole]
This area's strictly off-limits! Out, out!
\n\n
You don't have any business here! Go home!
You'd be wasting time even if you were to get by me.
\n\n
You won't be able to get in without the passwords anyway.
There's nothing past here except our WAREHOUSE.\nSo what brings you here?
\n\n
You're wanting to know what's inside this WAREHOUSE?\nIt's better you didn't know. For your own sake, I mean.

{01} entered a password.
«GOLDEEN need log.»
... ... ... ... ... ...
Another password is needed to open the door...
 
[For the second password, go to
Island 6 -> Ruin Valley -> Dotted Hole]

{01} entered two passwords.
«GOLDEEN need log.»
«Yes, nah, CHANSEY.»
... ... ... ... ... ...
The WAREHOUSE's door opened!
The WAREHOUSE's door is already open.
Oh, now your POKéMON look strong. You're willing to sell them?\nOh? You wanted to battle?
\n\n
We can give you a great price. Sell us your POKéMON!
Did you come here knowing it's TEAM ROCKET's WAREHOUSE?
\n\n
TEAM ROCKET broke up? What planet are you from?
I got word about you from the others.\nBut there's no way a kid like you'd know our BOSS GIOVANNI!
\n\n
Don't mess in the doings of adults, you jumped-up pip-squeak!
I don't know or care if what I'm doing is right or wrong...\nI just put my faith in GIOVANNI and do as I am told.
\n\n
You're doing things according to your beliefs and morals.\nI understand now...

I've made it so you can come back in through there.
Why don't you go get rested and refreshed for what lies ahead?
The ADMIN after me outranks me thoroughly as a TRAINER.
You'd better steel yourself for one harsh challenge.

That's quite enough of you playing the hero, kid.
Spreading lies about how TEAM ROCKET has disbanded...
It's such an obvious attempt to cause confusion in our ranks.
Fortunately, we're not so ignorant to fall for the lies of a child!
And now, I'll show you how scary an angry adult can be!
\n\n

We will abandon this WAREHOUSE...
But don't think this is over. I won't let this be the end.
I will find GIOVANNI. And I will resurrect TEAM ROCKET!
I will... Until then, farewell!
I almost managed to sell the SAPPHIRE for huge money...\nThen, you just had to come along and blow the whole deal apart!\nFufu... Fufufufu... There's no forgiveness for you!
\n\n
If I can't sell it, it's worthless!\nGo ahead, take it!
What do you want now? Go on, get lost, leave me be.\n \n[Return to Island 1 and Talk to Celio]
Tell me, where are the mountains around these parts?
\n\n
Aren't there any mountains around these parts?
A battle with you, so high up!
\n\n
Experience the joy of climbing!
I'm pretty familiar with the land around these parts.
\n\n
The door to the ruins... It has these strange patterns\nengraved on the outside. I don't know what they mean, though.
There appear to be many secrets still unsolved in this world.
\n\n
I suggest to you that you, too, give a thought to the secrets and\nmysteries of our world once a day.
I'm curious, what compelled you to come here?
\n\n
There are several ruins on the SEVII ISLANDS.\nThe majority of them date back a long way.

It's been said that there are
mysterious stones on this island.

I suspect it has something to do
with the ruins here.
\n\n
Those ruins over there...\nI haven't had any luck in finding how I can get inside.
The door doesn't budge at all.\nCheck it more thoroughly?

On closer inspection, there are several dots on the door...
 
[Use HM Cut on the door,
select your pokemon with the HM, click Cut]
The door is open.\n \n[The path is, Up, Left, Right, Down]
Fufu... Fufufufu... I guessed right.\nI was right in tailing you!

I knew that there was a SAPPHIRE here, so it belongs to me!
I'll sell it to TEAM ROCKET for serious money.
...D-don't glare at me like that!
If you want it back, why don't you go get it after I sell it?
I'll even tell you one of the passwords to TEAM ROCKET's
WAREHOUSE. The WAREHOUSE password I know is
«Yes, nah, CHANSEY.» I'm done. Don't think badly of me!
 
[Head to Five Island Meadows Rocket WareHouse]
There are many POKéMON locked away in the pen...
